Package com.composum.assets.commons.image

Class DefaultRenditionTransformer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.composum.assets.commons.image.DefaultRenditionTransformer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RenditionTransformer
    public class DefaultRenditionTransformer
extends Object
implements RenditionTransformer
    The RenditionTransformer is performing the build of each rendition requested by the AdaptiveImageServlet. This implementation is collecting the set of available ImageTransformer services which are used to perform the image transformation operations according to the asset configuration set if the image asset.
